name: Okhin, Daughter of The Abyss
text:
Whenever you flood or discard a card, you may untap Okhin, Daughter of The Abyss.
{2}{g}, {t}: Create a green Elemental Tide creature token. It has “This creature’s power and toughness are equal to the number of flooded lands on the battlefield plus the number of Tides you control.”
